statements: SELECT * FROM role_based_access_control;
SELECT username, role FROM role_based_access_control WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, role FROM role_based_access_control WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM role_based_access_control ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM role_based_access_control WHERE user_id < 5 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM role_based_access_control WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, role FROM role_based_access_control WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM role_based_access_control WHERE role IN ('admin', 'user') ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT role FROM role_based_access_control ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM role_based_access_control WHERE username LIKE 'j%' ORDER BY username ASC;

SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 1;

SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'User' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'J%' AND password IS NOT NULL;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_roles r ON u.role = r.role_name;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users;
SELECT * FROM roles;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT user_id, password_hash FROM users WHERE user_id=1;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE ur.role_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS role_count FROM user_roles GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY user_id ASC;

SELECT username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';

SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id > 1;
SELECT permission_name FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_id DESC;

SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role='Admin';

SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE user_id=2 AND role_id=1;

SELECT user_id, username FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id WHERE role_id = 1
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE roles.role_name = 'manager'

SELECT username, role_name, permission_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id

SELECT user_id, username, role_name, permission_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN role_permissions ON roles.role_id = role_permissions.role_id JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id WHERE user_id > 100
